<span style='color:{{<brand color chart-primary>}}'> The palmerpenguins dataset is **always** useful! üêß</span>

```{python}
from palmerpenguins import load_penguins
penguins = load_penguins()
penguins
```
```{python}
import seaborn as sns
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

fig, ax = plt.subplots()
sns.scatterplot(data=penguins,
                x="bill_length_mm",
                y="flipper_length_mm",
                hue="species",
                ax=ax)
ax.set_title("Penguins: Bill vs Flipper Length")
```
```{python}
fig.savefig("penguin_plot.png", dpi=150, bbox_inches="tight")
```
